content.question: A sled that weighs <math alttext="5.0 times 10 to the third power, newtons" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5.0</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>N</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> is pulled across level snow by dogs exerting a horizontal force on it. The coefficient of kinetic friction between the sled and snow is <math alttext="0.050" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0.050</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>. How much work is done by the dogs on the sled when the sled moves <math alttext="1.0 times 10 to the third power, meters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1.0</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>m</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> at constant speed?

choices.label: <math alttext="2.5 times 10 to the fifth power, joules" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2.5</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>J</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="5.0 times 10 to the fifth power, joules" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5.0</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>J</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="2.5 times 10 to the sixth power, joules" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2.5</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msup><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>J</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="5.0 times 10 to the sixth power, joules" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5.0</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msup><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>J</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="2.5 times 10 to the fifth power, joules" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2.5</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>J</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
